context: The iPod is a line of <a3_0>portable media players<a3_0/> and multi-purpose pocket computers designed and marketed by <a0_0><a6_0>Apple<a6_0/><a0_0/> Inc. The first line was released on <a1_0>October 2<a7_0>3<a7_0/>, <a5_0>2001<a5_0/><a1_0/>, about 8½ months after iTunes (Macintosh version) was released. The most recent iPod redesigns were announced on July 15, <a9_0>2015<a9_0/>. There are <a2_0>three<a2_0/> current versions of the iPod: the ultra-compact iPod <a8_0>Shuffle<a8_0/>, the compact iPod Nano and the <a4_0>touchscreen<a4_0/> iPod Touch.
